SEARCH
Package com.myfinanceapp.security

Class EncryptionService

java.lang.Object
com.myfinanceapp.security.EncryptionService
public final class EncryptionService extends Object
Service class providing AES encryption and decryption functionality. This class implements secure data encryption using AES-256-GCM mode, which provides both confidentiality and authenticity. It includes methods for: - Encrypting data with AES-256-GCM - Decrypting data with authentication - Key derivation using PBKDF2 - Secure random IV generation
Version:
4.0
Author:
SE_Group110

  • Method Details

    • encrypt

      public static EncryptionService.EncryptedData encrypt(String data, SecretKey key) throws EncryptionService.EncryptionException
      Encrypts the given data using AES-256-GCM encryption. This method: - Generates a random initialization vector (IV) - Initializes the cipher in encryption mode - Encrypts the data with authentication - Returns the encrypted data along with the IV and key ID
      Parameters:
      data - The data to be encrypted
      key - The encryption key to use
      Returns:
      An EncryptedData object containing the encrypted data, IV, and key ID
      Throws:
      EncryptionService.EncryptionException - If an error occurs during the encryption process

    • decrypt

      public static String decrypt(EncryptionService.EncryptedData encryptedData, SecretKey key) throws EncryptionService.EncryptionException
      Decrypts the given encrypted data using AES-256-GCM decryption. This method: - Decodes the IV and encrypted data from Base64 - Initializes the cipher in decryption mode - Verifies the authentication tag - Returns the decrypted data
      Parameters:
      encryptedData - The EncryptedData object containing the encrypted data, IV, and key ID
      key - The decryption key to use
      Returns:
      The decrypted data as a string
      Throws:
      EncryptionService.EncryptionException - If an error occurs during the decryption process

    • deriveKey

      public static SecretKey deriveKey(String password, byte[] salt) throws EncryptionService.EncryptionException
      Derives a cryptographic key from a password using PBKDF2. This method: - Uses PBKDF2 with HMAC-SHA256 for key derivation - Applies the configured number of iterations - Generates a key of the specified length
      Parameters:
      password - The password to derive the key from
      salt - The salt to use in the key derivation
      Returns:
      A SecretKey object suitable for AES encryption
      Throws:
      EncryptionService.EncryptionException - If an error occurs during key derivation
